entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
